from three percent women in Tech just me to 35 women in Tech which is huge like
it's very rare that you find a technical team that's 35 women in Tech so let's

so what's the problem with this okay
we had worked really really hard to bring women in but the women that we brought in weren't

success so the real kicker is the people that were
doing all this work to support women in Tech we're all women in Tech
so we were spending a lot of energy trying to create
an inclusive environment of belonging where we wanted to thrive in
and that energy was detracting from our technical contributions so we weren't
growing those technical skills so come promotion time who's getting promoted it's not the women they're spending

it was that we had failed to make any systemic change so we were just sort of tweaking things around the edges and as
